content: Ãˆ difficile distinguerla da suo fratello.
translations: eng:It is hard to distinguish you from your brother
eng:It's hard to distinguish you from your brother
eng:It's hard to tell you and your brother apart
eng:It's hard to tell you apart from your brother
eng:It's hard to tell you from your brother
